# sdds-table-body-row



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Events

| Event            | Description                                                                                                      | Type                  |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `sddsPagination` | Event that triggers pagination function. Needed as first rows have to be rendered in order for pagination to run | `CustomEvent<string>` |
